business_model_diagram_template.core_concept: Low-priced core product surrounded by premium optional extras
business_model_diagram_template.visual_metaphor: central core with radiating premium options

style_constants.aesthetic: minimalist, geometric, professional, clean lines, generous whitespace

visual_structure.description: central element with connected peripheral elements showing upgrades

shapes: 6-8 smaller rectangles/circles around it for add-ons

business_model_diagram_template.image_prompt: minimalist business diagram on dark charcoal background, central white circle labeled 'Core Product' with dollar sign, 6-8 cyan rectangular boxes arranged in circle around it connected by thin white lines, each box labeled 'Add-On' with increasing price symbols, clean geometric layout, professional style, generous spacing, simple icons, white and cyan color scheme
